SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc27
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Commands

Interface Command

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AddCardCommand, AddStarterCommand, ChooseObjectiveCommand, DrawCardCommand, PingCommand, ReconnectPlayerCommand, SendMessageCommand, SuspendPlayerCommand
public interface Command extends Serializable
Command interface represents all the command to be executed in the game, according to the command pattern. Implementations of this interface should define the behavior of the command when executed and provide information about the player who invoked the command.

    Executes the command
